medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Approximately 1.5 years before the current evaluation, the patient had episodic pain in the right flank, which resolved with medication and had no further follow-up. Two weeks before the current evaluation, bilateral back and flank pain developed.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Stage 4 chronic kidney disease, diabetes mellitus type 2, systemic hypertension, hyperlipidemia, osteoarthritis, tinnitus, bilateral sensorineural hearing loss. Previous surgeries include appendectomy and hysterectomy.
medical_history.social_history: The patient immigrated from the Dominican Republic a year earlier, has four children, is retired, and has a history of smoking two to five cigarettes daily for the past 30 years. She does not drink alcohol or use illicit drugs.
